amendatorysection.para: In accordance with the terms of the notice given as provided by section 52-601.01, a sale of the goods for reasonable value may be had to satisfy any valid claim of the claimant for which the claimant has a lien on the goods. Such sale shall extinguish any lien or security interest in the goods of a lienholder or security interest holder to which notice of sale was mailed pursuant to section 52-601.01.
